name: Ethereal Serpent
text_description: The Ethereal Serpent slithers through the shadows, striking fear into the hearts of its enemies. It has a chance to poison opponents with its venomous bite.
illustration_description: A sleek and shimmering serpent, its body made of translucent energy, coils around a mystical artifact. Its eyes glow with a sinister green light, and venom drips from its fangs.
